title: Projects,chalices, ca. 1930
medium: Pencil; yellow, green, and lilac watercolor; white heightening; creamy paper
markings: Watermark: tops of letters E or F, D, C
description: Vertical rectangle. Bordering line as 1939-84-20. Signature as 1939-84-79. Pointed and decorated quatrefoils with gems at the foot and knob. The shaft is shaped like a column. arched frieze and bands with gems at the cup.

tombstone.epitaph: Projects,chalices, ca. 1930.Pencil; yellow, green, and lilac watercolor; white heightening; creamy paper. 1939-84-82-b.
